name: Bone Garden
description:
A wave based, druid based experience. Defend your holy tree using the seeds it provides you. 

Controls:

WASD - Movement

SPACE - Melee attack

E - Pickup, place, and upgrade plants

R- Rotate a plant in front of you.

Kinda made for Alakajam but not really.

By Silver Lewis, JohnLee Cooper, and Austin Heller.
